page.title: 16Farnham Trading Estate.
page.content: On the Farnham Trading Estate there are 16 firms.Here are 3 examples. {MARTONAIR}This is a world wide 0rganisation that makes pneumatic equipment,components for robotic arms and other electronic equipment.They have factories in Europe,America and Australia.In Farnham they employ 430 people who travel from Farnham , Aldershot and Farnborough to work. {BOOKERS CATERING LTD.}This firm supplies all the schools in Hampshire with food ad drinks. They also supply restuarants with fresh fruits and cakes. They also make their own range of products called Summer Gold which includes a margarine. They employ 50 people. {WILTSHIRE & SONS}This is a vehicle sales and servicing unit. They employ 9 people & deal with all types of car, the most popular being Fords.
